units.title: Biological Sciences — AC9S6U01 — Habitats & survival conditions
units.whyThis: You’ve already learned some Biological Sciences, so this Y6 activity is the next step to extend it.

careers.title: Forensic Scientist
careers.whyThis: Forensic Scientist will help you build your Chemical Sciences and Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Forensic Scientist you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Chemical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Forensic Scientist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Forensic Scientist now and understand what to work towards.

At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what IT Support Specialist involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see IT Support Specialist now and understand what to work towards.

careers.whyThis: Network Administrator (Assoc) will help you build your Physical Sciences from where you are now. To move towards Network Administrator (Assoc) you still need inquiry skills like questioning & predicting, planning & conducting. You also need a bit more knowledge in Physical Sciences. At your year level it’s a good time to start exploring what Network Administrator (Assoc) involves. We slightly relaxed the rules so you can see Network Administrator (Assoc) now and understand what to work towards.
